meanings.definition: A person who sends text messages.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a fast texter and always replies quickly.
meanings.sent2: The texter typed out a message on their phone.
meanings.sent3: The texter's thumbs were like lightning as they sent messages back and forth.
meanings.sent4: She was a skilled texter, weaving words together effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The texter's phone was always buzzing with incoming messages.

meanings.definition: A device or software used for sending text messages.
meanings.sent1: I use my texter to stay in touch with my friends.
meanings.sent2: The texter has a user-friendly interface for easy messaging.
meanings.sent3: The texter beeped happily when a new message arrived.
meanings.sent4: His texter was like a magic wand, connecting him to the world instantly.
meanings.sent5: The texter's screen displayed a stream of incoming messages.
